description: 0. You wake up in a dark room. The sound of machinery can be heard around you, but the room is empty. In front of you is a door, and there is a small key on the floor.

1. You are at a yellow house. The door is planked shut but there are trails both ways around the house. There is also a window on the second floor, which might be reachable if you take a chance and climb. There is a sword on the ground.
1.1 You are on the East side og the house
1.2 You are on the West side of the house
